it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.effects

Interface Effect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddAmmo, AddPowerUp, ConsumeAmmo, ConsumeTargetedAmmo, Damage, DamageRoom, DamageTargetList, DamageTargetsAtDistance, DamageTile, DamageTileList, MarkTargetList, MarkTile, MarkTileList, MoveTarget, MoveTargetList, ReloadTarget, ReplaceAmmo, SortTile

    public interface Effect
    The Effect interface gives a common method for all different effects to be used by a card.
    Author:
    andreahuang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(Game game, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Targetable>> targets)
      This method is run only when all the conditions of the action unit is met.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(Game game,
         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Targetable>> targets)
        This method is run only when all the conditions of the action unit is met.
        Parameters:
        game - the game on which to perform the effect.
        targets - the targets is the input of the current player. Either tiles or players.
